quote: The seasons do not push one another; neither do clouds race the wind across the sky. All things happen in their own good time. – Dan Millman
fact: Babies are born without kneecaps. They don`t appear until the child reaches 2-6 years of age.
joke: Why are fish easy to weigh? Because they have their own scales.
